com.turnout.ws.controller

Class StudioController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.turnout.ws.controller.StudioController

  • @RestController
@Path(value="/")
public class StudioController
extends java.lang.Object
    StudioController class is front face for accessing and manipulating studios related resources.Class and all of its method is mapped with URI path template to which the resource responds. This class is registered with jersey resource configuration, So user can access it and its method by specified URI path template. Basic CRUD operation is done like update, retrieve and add.

      An injectable constructor with a dependency of StudioService as argument.

    • Method Detail

      • getStudiosList

        @RolesAllowed(value={"ADMIN","USER"})
@GET
@Path(value="/studios/status/{status}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONArray getStudiosList(@PathParam(value="status")
                                                                      java.lang.String status)
        It will get all the studios from database based on the given status. For example, it will list all the active studios if status is passed as active.
        Parameters:
        status - A string may have the value of active or inactive.
        Returns:
        It returns list if studios.

      • getStudioProfile

        @RolesAllowed(value={"ADMIN","USER"})
@GET
@Path(value="/studioDetails/{stdid}")
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject getStudioProfile(@PathParam(value="stdid")
                                                                         int stdid)
                                            throws com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException
        Returns details of studio based on passed studio id.
        Parameters:
        stdid - An id of studio
        Returns:
        It returns details of given studio.
        Throws:
        com.mashape.unirest.http.exceptions.UnirestException - a runtime exception happens while accessing studio's instagram account

      • saveStudio

        @RolesAllowed(value="ADMIN")
@Path(value="/saveStudio")
@POST
@Produces(value="application/json")
public org.json.simple.JSONObject saveStudio(org.json.simple.JSONObject crstdReq)
                                      throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                                             java.text.ParseException
        This method used to add new studio or update existing studio into database. It will return a studio id (primary key) of just inserted studio.
        Parameters:
        crstdReq - A JSONObject that holds details of studio to be inserted.
        Returns:
        Returns JSONObject with inserted voucher id.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
        java.text.ParseException
